# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/exclude ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/exclude ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ic_in_subckt.cir.hspice ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ic_in_subckt.cir.hspice ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ic_in_subckt.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ic_in_subckt.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ic_in_subckt.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ic_in_subckt.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ic_in_subckt.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ic_global_node_warning.cir.hspice ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ic_global_node_warning.cir.hspice ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ic_global_node_warning.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ic_global_node_warning.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/ic_global_node_warning.cir.sh ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ic_global_node_warning.cir.sh ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/ic_global_node_warning.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
add_test(NAME XDM/HSPICE/INITIAL_CONDITION/ic_global_node_warning.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} ic_global_node_warning.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ic_global_node_warning.cir ${OutputDataDir}/XDM/HSPICE/INITIAL_CONDITION/ic_global_node_warning.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST XDM/HSPICE/INITIAL_CONDITION/ic_global_node_warning.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;required:xdm;hspice;ic;nodeset")
add_test(NAME XDM/HSPICE/INITIAL_CONDITION/ic_in_subckt.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} ic_in_subckt.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ic_in_subckt.cir ${OutputDataDir}/XDM/HSPICE/INITIAL_CONDITION/ic_in_subckt.cir.prn )
set_property(TEST XDM/HSPICE/INITIAL_CONDITION/ic_in_subckt.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;required:xdm;hspice;ic;nodeset")
